location.permission.title: Location Permission
location.permission.message: This application needs access to your location to show you nearby places.
location.permission.allow: Please allow access when the browser requests it.
location.error.denied.title: Location Permission Denied
location.error.denied.message: You have denied permission to access your location. To use all features of this application, please allow access to your location.
location.error.unavailable.title: Location Unavailable
location.error.unavailable.message: Your location information is not available at this time. Please try again later.
location.error.timeout.title: Timeout Expired
location.error.timeout.message: The request to get your location took too long. Please try again.
location.error.unknown.title: Unknown Error
location.error.unknown.message: An unknown error occurred while trying to get your location. Please try again later.
location.error.unsupported.title: Your browser does not support geolocation
location.error.unsupported.message: This application needs access to your location to function properly. Please use a modern browser that supports geolocation.
location.current_location_description: This is your current location. Click on markers to see information about other locations.
location.description: This is a local {0} near your location. It's approximately {1} km from your current position. {2}s are great places to {3}.
